title: Google Doodle honors Toots Thielemans, harmonica legend
content:
Google is honoring Toots Thielemans, the legendary jazz harmonica player whose most widely known contribution is to the Sesame Street theme song.

The post Google Doodle honors Toots Thielemans, harmonica legend appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is honoring Toots Thielemans, the legendary jazz harmonica player whose most popularly known song was the theme song to Sesame Street.
